title: Pet Friendly Apartments in A Central Denver Location
posting_body: ['VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>', 'Villas on 76th, managed by BLDG Management', '2002 W. 76th Avenue', 'Denver, CO 80221', 'show contact info', "Villas on 76th is centrally located in Denver, CO north of the Boulder Turnpike and close to the Colorado's many job centers; among them, Downtown Denver, Boulder, Interlocken and Flatirons.", 'We offer outstanding amenities including a newly renovated clubhouse available for the private use of our residents.', 'Community Amenities', '*Playground', '*On-Site Maintenance', '*Club House', '*Laundry Facilities', '*Pet Park', '*Picnic Areas with Grills', '*Sparkling Pool', '*TV Lounge', 'This recently remodeled one bedroom apartment looks fantastic!', 'Perfectly located off the Denver-Boulder Turnpike- our residents find convenience around every corner.', 'Great in-unit and onsite amenities, our community offers quick access to everyday essentials, recreation, and entertainment.', 'Units are available now, call for details!', 'Community Features', '* se habla espanol', '* We are a social community!', 'Find our Yelp, Facebook or Twitter page online.', '* After-Hours Emergency Maintenance', '* Easy Access to Public Transportation', '* Short or Long Term Lease Available', '* Package Acceptance', '* Swimming Pool', '* Community Kitchen', '* Bark Park', '* Easy Freeway Access', '* Basketball Court', '* Laundry Care Center', '* TV Lounge', '* Renters Insurance is Required', '* Outdoor Grill Area', '* Professionally Managed', '* Liability Insurance is Required', '* WiFi Access', '* Extra Storage', '* Community Lounge', '*', "Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.", 'Call for details.', '* Landscaped Courtyards', '* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More']
